H0.text: Which TV programme's 'experts' include Francis Prior and Phil Harding. Timeless

H1.text: Which TV programme's 'experts' include Francis Prior and Phil Harding. Digging Up The Past

H2.text: Which TV programme's 'experts' include Francis Prior and Phil Harding. History Hunters

H3.text: Which TV programme's 'experts' include Francis Prior and Phil Harding. Timeteam

A4.text: Phil Harding was a regular on Time Team from the first series in 1994 until its cancellation in 2013.

A5.text: He also took part in the various spin-off series such as Time Team Extra (1998), Time Team Digs (2002) and Time Team Live.
